title: NNVCD Output Formatter Configuration
description: Configuration for formatting conflict analysis results into structured JSON

acled_category.description: Primary ACLED event category (e.g., Battles, Violence Against Civilians)
acled_category.source: Derived from event type mapping and normalization

confidence_score.description: Confidence in categorization based on data quality and source reliability
confidence_score.calculation: Based on source count, historical match, and specificity of location data

primary.description: Main actor involved in the event
primary.source: Normalized from report terminology to ACLED actor type

secondary.source: Normalized from report terminology to ACLED actor type

pattern_id.description: Identifier for recurring conflict pattern or anomaly type

bead_reference.description: Link to historical ACLED incident or trend if applicable
bead_reference.source: Retrieved from contextual analysis of historical data
bead_reference.default: N/A if no direct historical link

verification_status.description: Status based on fatality audit and data confidence
verification_status.source: Derived from fatality audit and data quality checks

formatting_logic.step_1: Compile analysis results from normalization, pattern identification, and fatality audit
formatting_logic.step_2: Assign confidence score based on data quality metrics
formatting_logic.step_3: Format results into JSON structure with all required fields
formatting_logic.step_4: Validate output for completeness and adherence to schema
formatting_logic.step_5: Log output for traceability and potential review
